meanings.definition: A feeling of enjoyment or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The likin on her face was evident as she watched the sunset.
meanings.sent2: Eating ice cream always brings me likin.
meanings.sent3: His likin for cheesy jokes always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The likin of a warm hug on a cold day is like sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The likin of a good book can transport you to another world.

meanings.sent1: I likin spending time with my friends at the park.
meanings.sent2: She likin the taste of fresh strawberries.
meanings.sent3: The cat likin the cozy spot by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: He likin the idea of going on an adventure.
meanings.sent5: They likin the sound of rain tapping on the window.

meanings.sent1: I likin vanilla ice cream over chocolate.
meanings.sent2: She likin to wear comfortable clothes.
meanings.sent3: He likin to take his time when solving puzzles.
meanings.sent4: They likin to listen to music while studying.
meanings.sent5: The dog likin to play fetch in the park.
